segments.text: I need to find a new furniture set for my living room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where are you going to find one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want to know where I bought mine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where did you get it from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much did it cost you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It cost me a couple thousand for the whole set .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The furniture is built extremely well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't mind paying a lot as long as the quality is good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , trust me . The quality is fantastic .
segments.speaker: S2
